Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at W London Leicester Square, you'll be centrally located in London, steps from Prince of Wales Theatre and Leicester Square. This 5-star hotel is close to Trafalgar Square and King's College London.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 197 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and minibars. Your pillowtop bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. 32-inch LCD televisions with pay movies provide entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms have hair dryers and bathrobes.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as a nightclub, a health club, and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as a nightclub, a health club, and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).
Make yourself at home in one of the 197 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and minibars. Your pillowtop bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. 32-inch LCD televisions with pay movies provide entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms have hair dryers and bathrobes.

With a stay at W London Leicester Square, you'll be centrally located in London, steps from Prince of Wales Theatre and Leicester Square. This 5-star hotel is close to Trafalgar Square and King's College London.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Prince of Wales Theatre - 0.1 km / 0 mi
Leicester Square - 0.1 km / 0 mi
Queens Theatre - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Piccadilly Circus - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Shaftesbury Monument - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Wyndham's Theatre - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Theatre Royal Haymarket - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Her Majesty's Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Piccadilly Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Photographers' Gallery - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Prince Edward Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Noel Coward Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Trafalgar Square - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Palace Theatre London - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Edith Cavell Memorial - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi

The preferred airport for W London Leicester Square is London (LCY-London City) - 12.6 km / 7.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Message.Text: Important notices: In case of any amendment please contact us to check the rates and conditions as these could change - Hotel will invoice the total amount of this booking in case of no show / En caso de modificacion, por favor contacten con nosotros para verificar las tarifas y condiciones de la reserva ya que podrian ser diferentes - En caso de no show el hotel se reserva el derecho de aplicar gastos del 100%
